Spanish: El vaso contiene agua fresca.
English: The glass contains fresh water.

Spanish: No te apartes del camino principal.
English: Don't stray from the main path.

Spanish: Decidí perdonar a aquellos que me hicieron daño.
English: I decided to forgive those who hurt me.

Spanish: Voy a intentar aprender a tocar la guitarra.
English: I'm going to try to learn to play the guitar.

Spanish: Ella sueña con viajar por todo el mundo.
English: She dreams of traveling the world.

Spanish: La oruga se convertirá en una mariposa.
English: The caterpillar will turn into a butterfly.

Spanish: ¿Cuándo vienes a visitarnos?
English: When are you coming to visit us?

Spanish: No te apresures, tenemos tiempo.
English: Don't rush, we have time.

Spanish: El tren se acerca a la estación.
English: The train is approaching the station.

Spanish: Anímate a probar algo nuevo.
English: Dare to try something new.

Spanish: Reconozco que me equivoqué.
English: I recognize that I was wrong.

Spanish: Siempre me apoya en mis decisiones.
English: He/she always supports me in my decisions.

Spanish: Vamos a charlar un rato en el parque.
English: Let's chat for a while in the park.

Spanish: La corrupción puede dañar seriamente a un país.
English: Corruption can seriously harm a country.

Spanish: Descubrí un lugar increíble durante mis vacaciones.
English: I discovered an amazing place during my vacation.

Spanish: ¿Cambiarías de idea si te doy más información?
English: Would you change your mind if I give you more information?

Spanish: ¿Puedes traer el informe a la reunión?
English: Can you bring the report to the meeting?

Spanish: Es importante mantener la calma en situaciones difíciles.
English: It's important to keep calm in difficult situations.

Spanish: El aroma de las flores llenaba la habitación.
English: The scent of the flowers filled the room.

Spanish: Cumplir tus promesas es esencial para mantener la confianza.
English: Keeping your promises is essential for maintaining trust.

Spanish: Prefiero referirme a la versión original del libro.
English: I prefer to refer to the original version of the book.

Spanish: Voy a tomar un café antes de ir al trabajo.
English: I am going to have a coffee before going to work.

Spanish: Me encanta cocinar platos italianos.
English: I love to cook Italian dishes.

Spanish: El paisaje hermoso me distrajo mientras conducía.
English: The beautiful landscape distracted me while I was driving.

Spanish: No olvides picar la cebolla antes de agregarla a la sartén.
English: Don't forget to chop the onion before adding it to the pan.

Spanish: Te voy a ofrecer mi ayuda en el proyecto.
English: I am going to offer you my help with the project.

Spanish: Voy a cambiar el color de las cortinas en la sala.
English: I am going to change the color of the curtains in the living room.

Spanish: Esa flor olerá deliciosa en primavera.
English: That flower will smell delicious in spring.

Spanish: Me gusta broncearme en la playa durante las vacaciones.
English: I like to tan on the beach during vacations.

Spanish: ¿Puedo preguntarte algo personal?
English: Can I ask you something personal?

Spanish: Me decepcionó mucho su actitud hacia el proyecto.
English: I was very disappointed by his attitude towards the project.

Spanish: Me opongo a la construcción de ese edificio en el parque.
English: I am opposed to the construction of that building in the park.

Spanish: Después del incidente, decidió callarse y no decir nada más.
English: After the incident, he decided to keep quiet and not say anything else.

Spanish: La fruta se pudrirá si no la guardamos en el refrigerador.
English: The fruit will rot if we don't put it in the refrigerator.

Spanish: Espero que nuestro equipo triunfe en el campeonato.
English: I hope our team triumphs in the championship.

Spanish: Ten cuidado al cruzar la calle.
English: Be careful when crossing the street.

Spanish: Voy a componer una canción para mi hermana.
English: I am going to compose a song for my sister.

Spanish: No olvides usar protector solar en la playa.
English: Don't forget to use sunscreen at the beach.

Spanish: La película va a durar más de tres horas.
English: The movie is going to last more than three hours.

Spanish: Esa pintura antigua puede valer mucho dinero.
English: That old painting could be worth a lot of money.

Spanish: Limpiar la casa es una tarea que hago todos los sábados.
English: Cleaning the house is a task I do every Saturday.

Spanish: Resolver un problema matemático puede ser desafiante pero gratificante.
English: Solving a math problem can be challenging but rewarding.

Spanish: No debes vacilar en pedir ayuda si la necesitas.
English: You should not hesitate to ask for help if you need it.

Spanish: Me gusta peinarme antes de salir a la calle.
English: I like to comb my hair before going out.

Spanish: Cada mañana me levanto temprano para hacer ejercicio.
English: Every morning I get up early to exercise.

Spanish: A veces un abrazo es todo lo que necesitas para sentirte mejor.
English: Sometimes a hug is all you need to feel better.

Spanish: Me enteré de la noticia por medio de las redes sociales.
English: I found out about the news through social media.

Spanish: Ten cuidado al levantar objetos pesados para no lastimarte.
English: Be careful when lifting heavy objects so you don't hurt yourself.

Spanish: Nos reuniremos en el parque para jugar fútbol.
English: We will meet at the park to play soccer.

Spanish: Es importante sembrar semillas en tierra fértil para que crezcan las plantas.
English: It is important to sow seeds in fertile soil for the plants to grow.

Spanish: Aunque fracases, nunca debes dejar de intentarlo.
English: Even if you fail, you should never stop trying.

Spanish: Me acostumbro a levantarme temprano para aprovechar el día.
English: I get used to getting up early to make the most of the day.

Spanish: El restaurante logró satisfacer todas mis expectativas culinarias.
English: The restaurant managed to satisfy all my culinary expectations.

Spanish: Vamos a celebrar mi cumpleaños en un restaurante elegante.
English: We are going to celebrate my birthday at a fancy restaurant.

Spanish: Me encanta andar en bicicleta por el parque los fines de semana.
English: I love to ride a bike in the park on weekends.

Spanish: Me gusta escuchar música clásica para relajarme.
English: I like to listen to classical music to relax.

Spanish: Me inscribí en un curso de fotografía para mejorar mis habilidades.
English: I enrolled in a photography course to improve my skills.

Spanish: Es importante mezclar bien los ingredientes para que el pastel quede esponjoso.
English: It is important to mix the ingredients well so that the cake turns out fluffy.

Spanish: Por favor, abre la ventana para que entre un poco de aire fresco.
English: Please open the window to let in some fresh air.

Spanish: Respirar profundamente puede ayudar a reducir el estrés.
English: Breathing deeply can help reduce stress.

Spanish: Atravesar el puente te llevará al otro lado del río.
English: Crossing the bridge will take you to the other side of the river.

Spanish: Doblar a la derecha en la siguiente intersección.
English: Turn right at the next intersection.

Spanish: Tranquilízate, todo estará bien.
English: Calm down, everything will be fine.

Spanish: Excavaron un pozo para buscar agua.
English: They dug a well to find water.

Spanish: Barre el piso antes de que lleguen los invitados.
English: Sweep the floor before the guests arrive.

Spanish: El presidente gobierna el país con firmeza.
English: The president governs the country firmly.

Spanish: Exijo una explicación sobre lo que sucedió.
English: I demand an explanation about what happened.

Spanish: Se puso una chaqueta antes de salir.
English: He put on a jacket before leaving.

Spanish: Después de correr, es necesario ducharse.
English: After running, it's necessary to take a shower.

Spanish: El sacerdote bendijo a los fieles al final de la misa.
English: The priest blessed the faithful at the end of the mass.

Spanish: Nació en una pequeña ciudad del sur de España.
English: He was born in a small town in the south of Spain.

Spanish: Visitaré a mis abuelos el fin de semana.
English: I will visit my grandparents this weekend.

Spanish: Mete las llaves en el bolsillo para no perderlas.
English: Put the keys in your pocket so you don't lose them.

Spanish: Toca la campana para llamar a la cena.
English: Ring the bell to call for dinner.

Spanish: Cálmate y piensa con claridad.
English: Calm down and think clearly.

Spanish: Dibuja un paisaje hermoso con colores brillantes.
English: Draw a beautiful landscape with bright colors.

Spanish: Compara los precios antes de comprar.
English: Compare the prices before buying.

Spanish: Comenzaré a estudiar para el examen final.
English: I will start studying for the final exam.

Spanish: Dame un minuto y te daré una respuesta.
English: Give me a minute and I will give you an answer.

Spanish: Te felicito por tu excelente desempeño en el trabajo.
English: I congratulate you on your excellent performance at work.

Spanish: No puedo aguantar más esta situación.
English: I can't stand this situation anymore.

Spanish: Me encanta bailar salsa los fines de semana.
English: I love to dance salsa on the weekends.

Spanish: Desearía poder viajar por todo el mundo.
English: I wish I could travel around the world.

Spanish: Me gusta leer novelas de misterio.
English: I like to read mystery novels.

Spanish: No dejes de hinchar las ruedas de la bicicleta.
English: Don't forget to pump up the bike tires.

Spanish: Es importante cepillarse los dientes después de cada comida.
English: It's important to brush your teeth after every meal.

Spanish: Voy a preparar una deliciosa cena para mis amigos.
English: I'm going to prepare a delicious dinner for my friends.

Spanish: Me encanta oír el sonido de las olas del mar.
English: I love to hear the sound of the ocean waves.

Spanish: Trátate bien, mereces lo mejor.
English: Treat yourself well, you deserve the best.

Spanish: Quiero aprender a tocar el piano.
English: I want to learn to play the piano.

Spanish: No pude evitar sollozar al ver la película.
English: I couldn't help but sob when watching the movie.

Spanish: Detente un momento y piensa en lo que estás haciendo.
English: Stop for a moment and think about what you're doing.

Spanish: No puedo conseguir entradas para el concierto.
English: I can't get tickets for the concert.

Spanish: Voy a hacer una tarta de manzana para el postre.
English: I'm going to make an apple pie for dessert.

Spanish: Te aseguro que llegaré a tiempo a la reunión.
English: I assure you that I will arrive on time for the meeting.

Spanish: Es importante reducir el consumo de plástico para proteger el medio ambiente.
English: It's important to reduce plastic consumption to protect the environment.

Spanish: Se me ocurrió una idea brillante para el proyecto.
English: I came up with a brilliant idea for the project.

Spanish: Intenta adivinar cuál es el sabor de la tarta.
English: Try to guess what the flavor of the cake is.

Spanish: Me di cuenta de que olvidé cerrar la ventana.
English: I realized that I forgot to close the window.
